729711f-a.text:
Stuyvesant Place, north from Hyatt Street (left), showing (right), part of the Richmond Borough Hall, the Richmond County Court House and the Macgregor Arms Apartments. The 2i.- stoy frae housa, in the center of the view, is the old house of tne Staten Island Institute of Arts and Sciences.
April 29, 1929
L. Sperr
729711f-a.folder: Stuyvesant Place & Hyatt Street, Staten Island, NY

728978f-a.text:
Hyatt Street, north side, between Stuyvesant Place and St. Marks Place. The St. George Theatre occupies the left corner of the building. In the left background apnears the Brigbton
~eiohts Reformed Church.
March 5, 1930.
P. L. Sperr

728975f-a.text:
15 Hyatt Street, north side, adjoining the N.W. corner of Stuyvesant Street, showing the St. George branch of the Staten
Island Savings Bank.
June,1937

oct. 22, 1931
